message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I'm interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $18000 might be a bit out of your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $15000. It's still a great deal considering the product's value and uniqueness.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $15000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm looking to save as much as possible. Would you be willing to consider $12000?

I understand your desire to save, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $14000. It's the lowest I can go and still make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make sure I can still make a decent return on my investment.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $14000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $13000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
